verses.roman:
kona vāñchā pūraṇa lāgi' vrajendra-kumāra
avatīrṇa haite mane karilā vicāra

synonyms: kona—some; vāñchā—desire; pūraṇa—fulfillment; lāgi'-for the matter of; vrajendra-kumāra—Lord Kṛṣṇa; avatīrṇa haite—to descend as an incarnation; mane—in the mind; karilā—did; vicāra—consideration.
translation: To fulfill a particular desire within His mind, Lord Kṛṣṇa, Vrajendra-kumāra, decided to descend on this planet after mature contemplation.
